Home.heroTitle: Indoor Golf Simulator & Bar in Bangkok
Home.heroSubtitle: Play 100+ courses, grab cold drinks and great food, and sharpen your game — all at BTS Chidlom
Home.metaTitle: Indoor Golf Simulator & Bar in Bangkok
Home.metaDescription: Play 100+ courses on state-of-the-art simulators, grab a drink, and escape the Bangkok heat. 4 bays from 500 THB/hr at BTS Chidlom.
Home.introText: {name} is Bangkok's premier indoor golf simulator and bar, located inside The Mercury Ville @ BTS Chidlom. Whether you're a seasoned player or picking up a club for the first time, enjoy state-of-the-art Korean Bravo Golf simulators, a full-service bar, and PGA-certified coaching — all in a fun, relaxed environment.
Home.why1Description: 4 private bays with 99% accuracy tracking — club speed, ball speed, launch angle, and spin. Play 100+ championship courses like Pebble Beach and TPC Sawgrass in stunning HD.
Home.why2Subtitle: Cold drinks, great food & good vibes
Home.why2Description: Enjoy ice-cold beers, refreshing drinks, burgers, sliders, and bar snacks while you play. Our full-service bar and kitchen mean you never have to leave the bay.
Home.why3Description: Whether you're picking up a club for the first time or fine-tuning your short game, our coaches tailor every lesson to your goals. Free trial lesson available.
Home.service1Description: Hourly simulator rentals from 500 THB. Up to 5 players per bay with free club rental.
Home.service2Description: PGA-certified coaching for all levels. Free trial lesson available. Packages from 1,800 THB.
Home.service3Description: Corporate events, team building, and private parties for 10–50+ guests from 9,999 THB.
Home.service4Description: Free standard sets included. Premium Callaway & Majesty rentals from 150 THB/hr.

HomeFaq.a1: LENGOLF is an indoor golf simulator bar in Bangkok, located on the 4th floor of The Mercury Ville at BTS Chidlom. We have 4 simulator bays with Korean Bravo Golf technology, a full-service bar with cocktails and food, and PGA-certified golf coaches on staff. It's a place to play golf, hang out with friends, and enjoy great drinks — all in air-conditioned comfort.
HomeFaq.q2: How much does it cost to play at LENGOLF?
HomeFaq.a2: Simulator bay rates start at 500 THB per hour on weekdays before 14:00, and go up to 900 THB per hour on weekends after 14:00. Each bay holds up to 5 players and free standard golf clubs are included. We also offer monthly packages from 3,000 THB. See our bay rates page for full pricing.
HomeFaq.a3: We're on the 4th floor of The Mercury Ville at BTS Chidlom, 540 Ploenchit Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 — directly accessible from the BTS Chidlom Skytrain station. See us on Google Maps.
HomeFaq.a4: LENGOLF is open daily from 10:00 AM to 11:00 PM, Monday through Sunday, including public holidays.
HomeFaq.q5: Do I need to bring my own golf clubs?
HomeFaq.a5: No — standard golf club sets are provided free with every bay booking, including ladies' sets. We also offer premium Callaway Warbird and Majesty Shuttle rentals from 150 THB per hour. Visit our club rental page for details.
HomeFaq.a6: Yes! We have three Thailand PGA-certified coaches on staff — PRO Boss, PRO Ratchavin, and PRO Min. They teach all skill levels from complete beginners to advanced players. Lessons start at 1,800 THB per hour and we offer a free 1-hour trial lesson. Visit our lessons page for packages and pricing.
HomeFaq.q7: Can I host an event or party at LENGOLF?
HomeFaq.a7: Absolutely! We host corporate events, team building, birthdays, and private parties for up to 50+ guests. Packages start at 9,999 THB and include golf bays, drinks, and catered food. Visit our events page or contact us on LINE @lengolf to plan your event.
HomeFaq.q8: How do I book a bay at LENGOLF?
HomeFaq.a8: Book online at booking.len.golf, add us on LINE @lengolf, or just walk in. Online booking lets you choose your date, bay, and time slot in advance. Walk-ins are welcome subject to availability.

Golf.metaDescription: Book a golf simulator bay at LENGOLF Bangkok. Korean Bravo Golf tech, 500–900 THB/hr for up to 5 players. 100+ courses and free club rental included.
Golf.heroSubtitle: Book Your Bay Now at LENGOLF
Golf.introText: At {name}, enjoy Bangkok's premier indoor golf experience with state-of-the-art Korean Bravo Golf simulators. Play 100+ championship courses, practice on the driving range, or challenge friends with interactive games — all included in the hourly rate.
Golf.way1Description: Get real swing data — club speed, ball speed, launch angle — and see exactly where to improve. Practice with music or drill down on the numbers.
Golf.way2Description: Play 100+ championship courses like Pebble Beach and TPC Sawgrass in stunning HD. No lost balls, no sunburn.
Golf.way3Description: Closest to the pin, longest drive, and more. Perfect for game night with friends — fun for beginners and pros alike.
Golf.setup1Subtitle: Focus on your swing, not setup
Golf.setup1Description: Automatic ball placement with realistic surface mats that simulate fairway, rough, and bunker conditions.
Golf.setup2Description: Captures club speed, ball speed, launch angle, and spin for detailed swing analysis and feedback.
Golf.setup3Description: Large graded turf green with realistic slopes that closely mimic real course conditions.
Golf.chooseYourBaySubtitle: We offer two distinct bay experiences — pick the one that matches your game
Golf.socialBaysDescription: Korean Bravo Golf simulators — perfect for beginners, groups & social play
Golf.aiLabPoweredBy: EYE Mini Lite launch monitor — used by PGA tour pros and top fitting studios worldwide
Golf.aiFeature1: Uneekor EYE Mini Lite launch monitor
Golf.clubRentalText: Free standard clubs are included with every booking. Upgrade to premium Callaway Warbird or Majesty Shuttle full sets from just 150 THB/hr — use in-house or take to any Bangkok golf course with same-day delivery.
Golf.nearYouSubtitle: Conveniently located at BTS Chidlom, serving golfers across Bangkok
Golf.srBayRatesCaption: LENGOLF Simulator Bay Rates (per hour, per bay)

Aqi.golfVeryGood: Perfect day to hit the range — swing by LENGOLF to warm up
Aqi.golfModerate: Good conditions — indoor golf keeps you comfortable
Aqi.golfUnhealthy: Skip the outdoor course — play indoors
Aqi.golfHazardous: Stay indoors — simulator golf in clean, filtered air
Aqi.healthVeryGood: Air quality is excellent. Enjoy your round!
Aqi.healthUnhealthy: Health effects possible. Consider indoor activities.

GolfFaq.q1: How much does it cost to play at LENGOLF?
GolfFaq.a1: Our simulator bays start at 500 THB per hour on weekdays (Mon–Thu) before 14:00, and go up to 900 THB per hour on weekends (Fri–Sun & public holidays) after 14:00. Each bay holds up to 5 players, and standard golf club rental is included at no extra charge.
GolfFaq.q2: Do I need to bring my own golf clubs?
GolfFaq.a2: No, standard club sets are provided free with every bay rental, including ladies' sets. We also offer premium club rentals — Callaway Warbird (men's) and Majesty Shuttle (women's) — starting at 150 THB per hour. Premium clubs can be used in-house or taken to any golf course in Bangkok. See our club rental page for full details and pricing. You're always welcome to bring your own clubs too.
GolfFaq.q3: How many people can play per bay?
GolfFaq.a3: Each simulator bay comfortably fits up to 5 players. The hourly rate is per bay, not per person, making it great value for groups.
GolfFaq.a4: LENGOLF is open daily from 10:00 AM to 11:00 PM, Monday through Sunday, including public holidays.
GolfFaq.q5: What golf courses can I play on the simulator?
GolfFaq.a5: Our Korean Bravo Golf simulators feature over 100 championship courses, including world-famous venues like Pebble Beach and TPC Sawgrass, all rendered in high-definition graphics.
GolfFaq.q6: How do I book a bay?
GolfFaq.a6: You can book online at booking.len.golf or add us on LINE @lengolf to reserve your bay. Walk-ins are also welcome, subject to availability.
GolfFaq.a7: We're located on the 4th floor of The Mercury Ville at BTS Chidlom, 540 Ploenchit Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330. We're directly accessible from the BTS Chidlom Skytrain station. See us on Google Maps.
GolfFaq.q8: What monthly packages do you offer?
GolfFaq.a8: We offer 7 monthly packages ranging from 3,000 THB (Bronze, 5 hours) to 18,000 THB (Diamond+, unlimited hours for 3 months). Packages include perks like food & drink discounts. We also have Early Bird packages starting at 4,800 THB for use before 14:00.
GolfFaq.a9: Yes, we have three Thailand PGA-certified professional coaches on staff — PRO Boss, PRO Ratchavin, and PRO Min. They offer personalized instruction for all skill levels, from beginners to advanced players, including junior golf development. Lessons use our simulators for swing analysis and data-driven improvement. Visit our lessons page for details.
GolfFaq.q10: How much do golf lessons cost?
GolfFaq.a10: Lesson packages start at 1,800 THB for a 1-hour session (1 golfer). Multi-hour packages offer better value: 10 hours for 16,000 THB (valid 12 months) or 30 hours for 45,000 THB (valid 24 months). We also have a Starter Package at 11,000 THB which includes 5 hours of coaching plus 5 hours of practice. Golf simulator usage is included in all lesson packages.

Events.metaDescription: Host your next event at LENGOLF Bangkok — corporate team building, birthdays, and private parties. Full venue rental for 50+ guests from 9,999 THB.
Events.heroSubtitle: Host a memorable indoor golf party at LENGOLF
Events.introText: LENGOLF is Bangkok's premier indoor golf event venue. Our state-of-the-art Korean Bravo Golf simulators, full bar, and customizable catering create the perfect setting for corporate events, birthday celebrations, team building, and private parties.
Events.amenity8: Contact our events team to learn more
Events.trustedByLabel: Companies that have hosted events at LENGOLF
Events.ctaSubtitle: Get in touch to customize your perfect event package
Events.exploreSubtitle: Check out everything LENGOLF has to offer

EventsFaq.q1: How many people can LENGOLF accommodate for events?
EventsFaq.a1: Our venue can comfortably host events for up to 50+ guests. We have 4 golf simulator bays, a full bar area, and flexible seating arrangements that can be configured to suit your event layout.
EventsFaq.q2: What event packages do you offer?
EventsFaq.a2: We offer two main packages: the Small Package (9,999 THB) for 10–15 guests with 2 golf bays, and the Medium Package (21,999 THB) for 15–25 guests with all 4 golf bays and exclusive full-location rental. Both include 3 hours, beer, cocktails, unlimited soft drinks, and a catered food spread.
EventsFaq.q3: Can I customize the food and drinks for my event?
EventsFaq.a3: Absolutely! Our standard packages include curated food platters from Smith & Co. (and Pizza Mania for the Medium Package), but all food and drink options can be fully customized to suit your preferences, dietary requirements, and event theme. We also offer add-ons like sound system and DJ packages for a complete party experience.
EventsFaq.q4: What types of events can you host?
EventsFaq.a4: We host corporate events, company parties, team building activities, meet & greets, birthdays, special celebrations, and filming or photoshoots. Our venue is versatile enough for both professional and social occasions.
EventsFaq.q5: How do I book an event at LENGOLF?
EventsFaq.a5: Fill out the inquiry form on this page, or contact us directly on LINE @lengolf. Our events team will get back to you to discuss your requirements, customize your package, and confirm your booking.
EventsFaq.a6: We're located on the 4th floor of The Mercury Ville at BTS Chidlom, 540 Ploenchit Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330. We're directly accessible from the BTS Chidlom Skytrain station. See us on Google Maps.
EventsFaq.a7: Not at all! Our simulators are fun for everyone, from complete beginners to experienced golfers. We offer games like closest to the pin and longest drive that anyone can enjoy. Our golf pros can also provide mini-lessons and tips during your event.
EventsFaq.q8: Can I get a custom event package?
EventsFaq.a8: Yes! Beyond our Small and Medium packages, we can create fully custom packages for larger groups, longer durations, or specific requirements. Add-ons include additional catering options, sound system and DJ setup, custom decorations, and more. Contact our events team on LINE @lengolf to discuss your needs.

Lessons.metaDescription: Learn golf from Thailand PGA professionals at LENGOLF Bangkok. Personalized simulator lessons for all levels. Free trial available, packages from 1,800 THB.
Lessons.introText: At LENGOLF, our Thailand PGA-certified coaches offer personalized golf instruction for every skill level — and you can try it with a free 1-hour trial lesson. Whether you're a beginner building fundamentals or an advanced player refining your technique, lessons use our state-of-the-art simulators for data-driven swing analysis and faster improvement.
Lessons.ourLessonsText: Our Swing Building and Improvement Program uses advanced video analysis and simulator data to identify and correct technique. Lessons cover swing fundamentals, physical strength, lateral rotation, and course strategy — giving you the confidence and consistency to play better on real courses.
Lessons.ctaSubtitle: Book a lesson with our PGA-certified coaches
Lessons.exploreSubtitle: Check out everything LENGOLF has to offer

LessonsFaq.q1: Do you offer a free trial golf lesson?
LessonsFaq.a1: Yes! We offer a free 1-hour trial lesson with one of our PGA Pro coaches. It's a great way to experience our coaching approach — you'll learn simple and effective techniques, build solid fundamentals, and get course-ready fast. No commitment required. Contact us on LINE @lengolf to book your free trial.
LessonsFaq.q2: How much do golf lessons cost at LENGOLF?
LessonsFaq.a2: Lesson packages start at 1,800 THB for a 1-hour session (1 golfer). Multi-hour packages offer better value — for example, 10 hours for 16,000 THB (valid 12 months) or 30 hours for 45,000 THB (valid 24 months). Group rates are available for 2 golfers or 3–5 golfers. Golf simulator usage is included in all lesson packages.
LessonsFaq.q3: What skill levels do your coaches teach?
LessonsFaq.a3: Our coaches work with all skill levels, from complete beginners to advanced players. Whether you're picking up a club for the first time or fine-tuning your shot shaping, our PGA-certified professionals tailor each lesson to your goals and ability.
LessonsFaq.q4: Who are the golf coaches at LENGOLF?
LessonsFaq.a4: We have three Thailand PGA-certified professional coaches: PRO Boss (Parin Phokan), specializing in drive training and course management; PRO Ratchavin (Ratchavin Tanakasempipat), specializing in beginner programs and short game; and PRO Min (Varuth Kjonkittiskul), specializing in course management and putting.
LessonsFaq.q5: How do I book a golf lesson?
LessonsFaq.a5: Contact us on LINE @lengolf to schedule your lesson, or book online at booking.len.golf. Our team will match you with the right coach based on your goals and availability.
LessonsFaq.q6: What is included in a golf lesson?
LessonsFaq.a6: Every lesson includes one-on-one instruction from a PGA-certified coach, use of our state-of-the-art golf simulators with swing analysis data, and standard golf club rental. Our coaches use video analysis to identify and correct technique, giving you actionable feedback each session.
LessonsFaq.q7: Do you offer golf lessons for kids and juniors?
LessonsFaq.a7: Yes! All three of our coaches have junior golf development experience. We offer tailored programs for young golfers to build proper fundamentals, develop swing mechanics, and learn course etiquette in a fun, supportive environment.
LessonsFaq.a8: We're located on the 4th floor of The Mercury Ville at BTS Chidlom, 540 Ploenchit Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330. We're directly accessible from the BTS Chidlom Skytrain station. See us on Google Maps.
LessonsFaq.q9: What are the Starter Package and Sim to Fairway packages?
LessonsFaq.a9: The Starter Package (11,000 THB) includes 5 hours of coaching plus 5 hours of practice time and a free golf glove — ideal for beginners building a foundation. The Sim to Fairway package (13,499 THB) includes 5 hours of coaching plus 1 on-course lesson, so you can take your simulator skills to a real golf course. On-course fees for both student and coach must be covered by the customer.

AboutUs.metaTitle: About Us — Indoor Golf Simulator & Bar
AboutUs.metaDescription: Founded by golf-loving expats at BTS Chidlom, Bangkok. 4 simulator bays, full bar, PGA coaching, and a social vibe you won't find anywhere else.
AboutUs.heroTitle: Golf, Drinks & Good Times in Bangkok
AboutUs.heroSubtitle: Founded by golf-loving expats at BTS Chidlom
AboutUs.storyParagraph1: Our story began as a group of golf-loving expats in Bangkok who just wanted to play golf. But we often found that traffic and weather got in the way. Frustrated, we sought out golf simulators as a convenient alternative. While the technology was impressive, the private room and closed off nature of the available options in Bangkok left much to be desired. We envisioned a place that combined the excitement of golf with a lively, social atmosphere.
AboutUs.storyParagraph2: Determined to create something unique, we decided to take matters into our own hands. We tore down the walls, added a bar, and infused the space with a welcoming, relaxed vibe. The result is {name}, a haven for golf enthusiasts of all skill levels. Located at the Chidlom BTS stop, we offer state-of-the-art Korean simulators, delicious food and drinks, and a break from the Bangkok heat. At {name}, we're more than just a golf simulator; we're a community where fun and golf thrive.
AboutUs.why1Description: Experience the best in virtual golf with our advanced Korean simulators for realistic gameplay. Enjoy the convenience of our auto-tee system and choose from hundreds of international courses.
AboutUs.why2Description: Conveniently located inside The Mercury Ville at Chidlom BTS, we're easily accessible from anywhere in Bangkok. Enjoy 3 hours of free parking.
AboutUs.why3Description: Our friendly, attentive staff ensure you feel welcome and have everything you need.
AboutUs.why4Description: Enjoy a perfect blend of excitement and relaxation in our lively, yet laid-back atmosphere.
AboutUs.why5Description: Savor delicious food and a wide selection of drinks to complement your golfing experience.
AboutUs.why6Description: Improve your game with expert lessons from our professional golf instructors.
AboutUs.ctaSubtitle: Book your bay online or contact us on LINE

AboutUsFaq.a1: We're on the 4th floor of The Mercury Ville at BTS Chidlom, 540 Ploenchit Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330. We're directly connected to the BTS Chidlom Skytrain station, so you can get here without stepping outside. See us on Google Maps.
AboutUsFaq.a2: Yes! The Mercury Ville offers 3 hours of free parking for visitors. Additional parking is available at standard mall rates. Most guests find it easiest to arrive via BTS Chidlom, which connects directly to the mall.
AboutUsFaq.q3: Do I need golf experience to visit LENGOLF?
AboutUsFaq.a3: Not at all — everyone is welcome, from complete beginners to experienced golfers. Our simulators are fun and easy to use, and free standard golf club sets are provided with every bay booking. If you'd like guidance, our PGA-certified coaches offer lessons for all skill levels. Check our lessons page for details.
AboutUsFaq.a4: LENGOLF is open daily from 10:00 AM to 11:00 PM, Monday through Sunday, including public holidays.
AboutUsFaq.q5: Can I book LENGOLF for a group or event?
AboutUsFaq.a5: Absolutely! Each bay fits up to 5 players, and we host events for 50+ guests with full-location rental, catering, and drink packages starting at 9,999 THB. Visit our events page or contact us on LINE @lengolf to plan your event.
AboutUsFaq.a6: The easiest way is LINE @lengolf — you can also call us at 096-668-2335, email info@len.golf, or book directly at booking.len.golf. Our friendly team typically responds within a few hours.

ClubRental.metaTitle: Clubs at LENGOLF | Premium Golf Club Rental for Simulator Sessions
ClubRental.metaDescription: Upgrade your LENGOLF bay session with premium golf clubs. Free standard sets included. Callaway Warbird & Majesty Shuttle from 150 THB/hr — in-house simulator use only.
ClubRental.heroBadge: For use in your LENGOLF bay
ClubRental.heroSubtitle: Free Standard Sets • Callaway & Majesty Upgrades
ClubRental.introText: Every bay booking at LENGOLF includes free standard golf clubs. Want premium gear? Upgrade your session with Callaway Warbird or Majesty Shuttle sets — hourly rates from just 150 THB/hr for use in your simulator bay.
ClubRental.premiumPricingNote: *Standard clubs are always free with any bay booking. In-bay use only — for taking clubs to a Bangkok golf course, see our Golf Course Club Rental page.
ClubRental.tryBeforeBuyText: Test any second-hand set on our simulators before you commit
ClubRental.ctaSubtitle: Book your bay online — standard clubs included free, or reserve premium sets
ClubRental.exploreSubtitle: Check out everything LENGOLF has to offer
ClubRental.crossLinkCourseDesc: Take premium clubs to any Bangkok golf course — full-day rates from 1,200 THB
ClubRental.crossLinkSecondHandDesc: Buy used Callaway & TaylorMade in Bangkok — test in our simulators first
ClubRental.tier1Spec2: Included free with every bay booking
ClubRental.tier2Spec2: In-bay simulator use at LENGOLF only
ClubRental.tier2Spec3: Upgrade any bay session — no commitment needed
ClubRental.tier3Spec2: In-bay simulator use at LENGOLF only
ClubRental.tier3Spec3: Upgrade any bay session — no commitment needed
ClubRental.gear1Description: Premium synthetic leather gloves in all sizes
ClubRental.gear2Description: Practice-grade balls for range or course play
ClubRental.gear3Description: Delivery to any Bangkok golf course (full-day rate per set required)
ClubRental.secondHand1: Test any set on our simulators before you commit
ClubRental.secondHand2: Well-maintained Callaway and TaylorMade sets available
ClubRental.secondHand3: Significant savings over brand-new retail prices
ClubRental.secondHand4: Perfect for tourists or beginners not ready to invest in new gear
ClubRental.secondHand5: Ask our staff about current availability and pricing
ClubRental.why1Description: Callaway Warbird and Majesty Shuttle — trusted brands used by pros and amateurs worldwide
ClubRental.why2Description: Rent for in-house play or take clubs to any golf course in Bangkok with same-day delivery
ClubRental.why3Description: Hourly rates (1–4 hrs) for in-house simulator sessions. Taking clubs to a golf course? The full-day rate (1,200 THB/set) applies, plus a 500 THB delivery fee.
ClubRental.why4Description: Reserve clubs online at booking.len.golf or walk in — no deposit required

ClubRentalFaq.q1: Can tourists rent golf clubs at LENGOLF?
ClubRentalFaq.a1: Absolutely! We welcome tourists and visitors. Standard clubs are free with any bay booking, and premium Callaway/Majesty sets start at just 150 THB per hour. No membership or deposit required — just walk in or book online at booking.len.golf.
ClubRentalFaq.q2: What brands are available for premium club rental?
ClubRentalFaq.a2: We offer Callaway Warbird full sets for men and Majesty Shuttle full sets for women. Both include driver, fairway woods, irons (5–PW), and putter. These are current-generation clubs maintained to high standards.
ClubRentalFaq.q3: Can I use rented clubs outside of LENGOLF?
ClubRentalFaq.a3: Yes! Premium club rentals can be used at LENGOLF or taken to any golf course in Bangkok. For off-site use, the full-day rate (1,200 THB per set) applies — hourly rates are for in-house simulator sessions only. We also offer delivery for 500 THB anywhere in Bangkok. Pre-payment is required for all delivery orders. Contact us on LINE @lengolf to arrange.
ClubRentalFaq.q4: How much does premium club rental cost per hour?
ClubRentalFaq.a4: Hourly rates (150 THB / 1 hr, 250 THB / 2 hrs, 400 THB / 4 hrs) apply to in-house simulator use at LENGOLF only. For taking clubs to a golf course, only the full-day rate (1,200 THB per set) is available. Standard house clubs are always free with any bay booking. Check our bay rates page for simulator pricing.
ClubRentalFaq.q5: Do you deliver golf clubs in Bangkok?
ClubRentalFaq.a5: Yes! We deliver premium club sets anywhere in Bangkok for 500 THB (pick-up and return included). The full-day rate (1,200 THB per set) applies for all delivery bookings, and pre-payment is required. Contact us on LINE @lengolf to arrange.
ClubRentalFaq.q6: Can I try clubs before buying second-hand?
ClubRentalFaq.a6: Yes! You can test any of our second-hand sets on the simulators before you buy. We regularly have well-maintained Callaway and TaylorMade sets available at significant savings. Ask our staff or message us on LINE @lengolf for current availability and pricing.

CourseClubRental.metaTitle: Golf Course Club Rental Bangkok | Rent Clubs for Any Course
CourseClubRental.metaDescription: Rent premium Callaway or Majesty golf clubs for any Bangkok golf course. Full-day 1,200 THB, delivery 500 THB. Confirms within 2 hours via LINE.
CourseClubRental.heroTitle: Take Premium Clubs to Any Bangkok Golf Course
CourseClubRental.heroSubtitle: Callaway Warbird & Majesty Shuttle — Delivered to Your Course
CourseClubRental.introText: Heading to a Bangkok golf course but don't have clubs? Rent Callaway Warbird or Majesty Shuttle sets from LENGOLF — we'll confirm availability within 2 hours and arrange delivery or pick-up for your round.
CourseClubRental.step1Desc: Select men's Callaway Warbird or women's Majesty Shuttle and your preferred date
CourseClubRental.step2Desc: Tap the button below — it opens with a pre-filled inquiry message
CourseClubRental.step3Desc: We confirm availability and send payment details within 2 hours
CourseClubRental.step4Desc: Pick up at LENGOLF or receive delivery to your course / hotel
CourseClubRental.pricingNote: Hourly rates are not available for off-site use. Multi-day packages are ideal for tourists staying in Bangkok — clubs can be delivered once and collected at the end of your stay.
CourseClubRental.deliveryDesc: Pick-up and return included. Coverage: anywhere in Bangkok. Same-day delivery available. Pre-payment required for all delivery orders.
CourseClubRental.prepaymentNote: Pre-payment required for all delivery bookings. We'll send payment details via LINE after confirmation.
CourseClubRental.ctaSubtitle: Message us on LINE — we confirm within 2 hours
CourseClubRental.ctaLinePrefill:
Hi LENGOLF! I'd like to hire golf clubs for an off-site round.
Clubs: [Men's Callaway Warbird / Women's Majesty Shuttle]
Date: ___
Delivery needed: Yes / No (address if yes: ___)
CourseClubRental.comingSoonNote: Online booking with instant confirmation coming soon — for now we confirm within 2 hours via LINE.
CourseClubRental.crossLink1Desc: Hourly club rental for your simulator session
CourseClubRental.crossLink2Desc: Buy used Callaway & TaylorMade in Bangkok

CourseClubRentalFaq.q1: Can you deliver clubs to my hotel in Bangkok?
CourseClubRentalFaq.a1: Yes! We deliver premium club sets anywhere in Bangkok for 500 THB (pick-up and return included). Same-day delivery is available when ordered in the morning. Pre-payment is required for all delivery orders. Message us on LINE @lengolf to arrange.
CourseClubRentalFaq.q2: What is the return policy for rented clubs?
CourseClubRentalFaq.a2: Clubs must be returned in the same condition they were rented. We ask that you return them to LENGOLF or arrange a pick-up via our delivery service after your round. Any damage beyond normal wear may incur a repair fee.
CourseClubRentalFaq.q3: What's included in the full set?
CourseClubRentalFaq.a3: Each set includes a driver, fairway woods, irons (5–PW), and a putter. A golf bag is included for transport. Clubs are well-maintained current-generation Callaway Warbird (men's) or Majesty Shuttle (women's).
CourseClubRentalFaq.q4: What if I need clubs for a very early tee time?
CourseClubRentalFaq.a4: Just let us know your tee time when you message us. For very early morning rounds, we recommend contacting us the day before to arrange delivery the evening prior. We'll do our best to accommodate your schedule.
CourseClubRentalFaq.q5: Do you deliver to courses outside Bangkok?
CourseClubRentalFaq.a5: Our delivery service covers Bangkok. For courses further afield, please contact us on LINE and we'll discuss options. Self pick-up from LENGOLF at The Mercury Ville @ BTS Chidlom is always available.
CourseClubRentalFaq.a6: After we confirm availability on LINE, we'll send payment details (bank transfer or PromptPay). Pre-payment is required before clubs are dispatched or made available for pick-up.

SecondHandClubs.metaTitle: Second-Hand Golf Clubs Bangkok | Buy Used Callaway & TaylorMade
SecondHandClubs.metaDescription: Buy second-hand golf clubs in Bangkok at LENGOLF. Well-maintained Callaway and TaylorMade sets. Test any club in our simulators before you buy.
SecondHandClubs.heroSubtitle: Test in Our Simulators Before You Buy
SecondHandClubs.introText: Looking to buy golf clubs in Bangkok without paying full retail price? LENGOLF stocks well-maintained second-hand Callaway and TaylorMade sets. Test any club in our simulator bays before you commit.
SecondHandClubs.emptyStateText: Message us on LINE for what's currently available — stock changes regularly.
SecondHandClubs.testText: Swing any club in our indoor simulator bays before committing to a purchase. Our staff will set up the bay and you can see real launch data — ball speed, carry distance, and accuracy — with your potential new clubs.
SecondHandClubs.ctaSubtitle: Message us on LINE — our staff will share what's available and arrange a test session
SecondHandClubs.crossLink1Desc: Hourly club rental for your simulator session
SecondHandClubs.crossLink2Desc: Take clubs to any Bangkok golf course
SecondHandClubs.detailEnquireHint: Message us on LINE for availability and to arrange a test session

SecondHandClubsFaq.q1: How do I buy a second-hand club set?
SecondHandClubsFaq.a1: Message us on LINE @lengolf to find out what's currently in stock. We'll share photos, specs, and pricing. If you'd like to test clubs before buying, we can arrange a session in our simulator bays.
SecondHandClubsFaq.q2: Can I test clubs in your simulators before buying?
SecondHandClubsFaq.a2: Yes! This is one of the unique benefits of buying from LENGOLF. We'll set up a bay and you can swing the clubs with full simulator data — ball speed, carry distance, and shot shape. This way you know exactly what you're getting before you commit.
SecondHandClubsFaq.q3: How often does your second-hand stock change?
SecondHandClubsFaq.a3: Stock varies and changes regularly as we source new sets and sell existing ones. We recommend messaging us on LINE for the most current availability. Follow our LINE account to be notified when new sets arrive.
SecondHandClubsFaq.a4: We primarily stock Callaway and TaylorMade sets, which are the most popular brands in Bangkok. Occasionally we have Titleist, Ping, or other premium brands. Message us on LINE for current availability.
SecondHandClubsFaq.q5: Are the clubs in good condition?
SecondHandClubsFaq.a5: All our second-hand clubs are inspected and graded before listing. We only sell sets we'd be comfortable recommending — Excellent (minimal use), Good (light wear), or Fair (visible wear but fully playable). The condition is always clearly indicated.

Blog.metaDescription: Golf tips, Bangkok entertainment guides, and indoor golf insights from LENGOLF. Your go-to resource for getting more out of the game.
Blog.heroSubtitle: Golf tips, Bangkok entertainment, and more from LENGOLF
Blog.noPosts: No blog posts yet. Check back soon!
Blog.ctaSubtitle: Book your bay online or contact us on LINE
Blog.exploreSubtitle: Check out everything LENGOLF has to offer

BlogFaq.q1: What topics does the LENGOLF blog cover?
BlogFaq.a1: Our blog covers indoor golf tips and techniques, Bangkok entertainment guides, golf simulator technology, upcoming events and promotions, and beginner-friendly guides to help you get the most out of your game.
BlogFaq.q2: How often is the blog updated?
BlogFaq.a2: We publish new articles regularly to keep you informed about the latest golf tips, LENGOLF news, and Bangkok lifestyle content. Follow us @lengolf on LINE for notifications.
BlogFaq.q3: Can I book a bay or lesson directly from the blog?
BlogFaq.a3: Yes! You can book a simulator bay anytime at booking.len.golf, or contact us on LINE @lengolf to enquire about lessons and events.
BlogFaq.a4: LENGOLF is located on the 4th floor of The Mercury Ville at BTS Chidlom, 540 Ploenchit Road, Bangkok. Find us easily on Google Maps — we're open daily from 10 AM to 11 PM.

BlogPost.ctaText: Experience Bangkok's premier indoor golf simulator at LENGOLF. Walk-ins welcome or book online.
